text: Is there a beta for mobile style controls for the drag and drop editor?
All dnd section margin and padding values have been overridden site wide for a client. And I don’t know why… even in looking at page revision histories the section values are wiped clean
Hey John could you share an example of where this can be seen? And what you are expecting to see?
This might be related to <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CEQQ9NFK2/p1593023555159800>
these fields had values to create a non-standard layout. Now the values are wiped to defaults
Gotchya, so what is showing as left padding of 0px was set to something, now it is no longer
Do you know what it was set to
(I do not think this is related to what I posted above, actually)
Could you share with me an example page where this occured
actually top and bottom. They were manually set to 180px and 0 respectively. and margin was negative on some rows
yes
Thank you
cc <@UCV0BC2A3> <@U7NG431HN> looks like this might be an editor issue? It sounds like page level section CSS was removed, or saved without the set values?
we’ve had a lot of updates around styling lately, we’ll need to go through the regular support process to investigate (<@UCV0BC2A3> maybe you could make a JIRA ticket?)
we’ll need a link to the exact page in question
<https://www.onpaysolutions.com/>
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/inspire/entry/website-for-accounts-payable-automation-platform|here> is what it used to look like with the section’s old margin and padding

<@UCV0BC2A3> I looked into this for a moment and found the negative margin is actually being set in a module within that section. However, this top padding of 0px is no longer set <http://webcache.googleusercontent.com/search?q=cache:https://www.onpaysolutions.com/>
Thanks for the pointer! Will create JIRA and keep digging into this :thumbsup:
